events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I am dissatisfied with the size.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J., who specializes in refund and returns handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the refund process today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed since delivery?
Sure, my order number is 4537829. The jacket hasn't been washed or worn extensively, only tried on once.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate a full refund once the jacket is returned. I will send you prepaid return shipping details shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us.
